* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                 |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | [EvilHack - monst.c, line 884](https://github.com/k21971/EvilHack/blob/v0.8.3/src/monst.c#L884) |

A **goblin shaman**, o, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). The goblin shaman is an [oorcish](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_class\) "Orc (monster class)") monster that can cast spells similar to a [kobold shaman](/wiki/Kobold_shaman "Kobold shaman"), but they are slightly faster and more common.

A goblin shaman will attempt to cast one clerical [monster spell](/wiki/Monster_spell "Monster spell") during each of its turns, and possesses [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance").

[Eating](/wiki/Eating "Eating") a goblin shaman [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") can confer intrinsic [telepathy](/wiki/Telepathy "Telepathy") as with most spellcasting monsters.

## Encyclopedia entry

Now goblins are cruel, wicked, and bad-hearted. They make  
no beautiful things, but they make many clever ones. They  
can tunnel and mine as well as any but the most skilled  
dwarves, when they take the trouble, though they are usually  
untidy and dirty. Hammers, axes, swords, daggers, pickaxes,  
tongs, and also instruments of torture, they make very well,  
or get other people to make to their design, prisoners and  
slaves that have to work till they die for want of air and  
light.  
\[ The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Goblin_shaman_\(EvilHack\)\&action=edit)*

html:
Goblin shaman (EvilHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
o goblin shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks Spell-casting 0d0 clerical
o goblin shaman (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks

Spell-casting 0d0 clerical

Base level 2
Base experience 17
Speed 9
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment -4 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 400
Nutritional value 100
Size Small
Resistances poison
Resistances conveyed Telepathy

A goblin shaman:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 884

A goblin shaman, o, is a type of monster that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. The goblin shaman is an oorcish monster that can cast spells similar to a kobold shaman, but they are slightly faster and more common.

A goblin shaman will attempt to cast one clerical monster spell during each of its turns, and possesses poison resistance.

Eating a goblin shaman corpse or tin can confer intrinsic telepathy as with most spellcasting monsters.

Encyclopedia entry

Now goblins are cruel, wicked, and bad-hearted. They make
no beautiful things, but they make many clever ones. They
can tunnel and mine as well as any but the most skilled
dwarves, when they take the trouble, though they are usually
untidy and dirty. Hammers, axes, swords, daggers, pickaxes,
tongs, and also instruments of torture, they make very well,
or get other people to make to their design, prisoners and
slaves that have to work till they die for want of air and
light.
[ The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''goblin shaman''', {{green|o}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[EvilHack]] and [[Hack'EM]]. The goblin shaman is an [[Orc (monster class)|oorcish]] monster that can cast spells similar to a [[kobold shaman]], but they are slightly faster and more common.

A goblin shaman will attempt to cast one clerical [[monster spell]] during each of its turns, and possesses [[poison resistance]].

[[Eating]] a goblin shaman [[corpse]] or [[tin]] can confer intrinsic [[telepathy]] as with most spellcasting monsters.

	or get other people to make to their design, prisoners and

	     [ The Hobbit, by J.R.R. Tolkien ]
